mapper.sql: t.f_pid, t.f_code, t.f_name, t.f_column_list, t.f_query_interface, t.f_query_param, t.f_query_method, t.f_sys_flag, t.f_remark, t.f_last_modifier, t.f_last_modified_time, t.f_creator, t.f_create_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_pub_export_config ( f_pid, f_code, f_name, f_column_list, f_query_interface, f_query_param, f_query_method, f_sys_flag, f_remark, f_last_modifier, f_last_modified_time, f_creator, f_create_time ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{column_list,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{query_interface,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{query_param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{query_method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sysFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into t_pub_export_config ( f_pid, f_code, f_name, f_column_list, f_query_interface, f_query_param, f_query_method, f_sys_flag, f_remark, f_last_modifier, f_last_modified_time, f_creator, f_create_time )
select #{entity.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.column_list,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.query_interface,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.query_param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.query_method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.sysFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.lastModifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.lastModifiedTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entity.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} from dual
mapper.select: select t.*, d.f_name as f_query_method_name from t_pub_export_config t left join t_pub_dic d on t.f_query_method = d.f_pid and d.f_sys_flag = '1'
